data.name: HeroBadgeText
data.value: Verified professionals • Clear details • Trusted workflows

data.name: HeroDescription
data.value: Homeix connects customers with approved home-service professionals through one organized platform — so you can post needs, compare options, and choose confidently.

data.name: WhyHomeixSubtitle
data.value: Built to solve real problems: trust, unclear details, and hard communication.

data.name: ForCustomersDesc
data.value: Find reliable help faster. Compare options using real profiles, clear service details, and community feedback—so you choose with confidence.

data.name: ForProfessionalsDesc
data.value: Reach real customers in a structured marketplace. Present your services clearly, build reputation with reviews, and manage your work from one place.

data.name: ApprovedProfessionalsDesc
data.value: Professionals apply before offering services, helping customers feel safer when choosing.

data.name: ClearServiceDetailsDesc
data.value: Posts include useful information like descriptions, photos, and price ranges—so expectations are clearer.

data.name: RatingsReviewsDesc
data.value: Reputation is visible to everyone, encouraging better quality and more accountable behavior.

data.name: PublicProfilesDesc
data.value: View profile info, services, and reviews to make smarter decisions before contacting anyone.

data.name: SearchFilteringDesc
data.value: Find what you need faster by filtering by category, price range, and community rating.

data.name: FavoritesDesc
data.value: Save posts you like and return to them later without searching again.

data.name: PhotosDesc
data.value: Photos help customers explain problems better and help professionals present services clearly.

data.name: HighlightedOffersDesc
data.value: Featured content helps users discover important offers faster while keeping the marketplace organized.

data.name: ResponsiveExperienceDesc
data.value: Smooth experience across desktop and mobile so users can manage work anywhere.

data.name: TrustTransparencyDesc
data.value: Homeix reduces uncertainty by using verified workflows, clear post information, and real community feedback — improving the whole home-service experience for everyone.

data.name: PopularServicesSubtitle
data.value: Hover or tap to preview — the row moves automatically.

data.name: PathCustomerDesc
data.value: Post your needs, compare options, and choose based on real reviews.

data.name: PathProfessionalDesc
data.value: Apply, publish services clearly, and build reputation with real feedback.

data.name: FAQ1Question
data.value: How do I post a request as a customer?

data.name: FAQ1Answer
data.value: Create an account, then publish a request with a clear description, location, photos, and budget range.

data.name: FAQ2Answer
data.value: Professionals submit an application. Once approved, they can publish services and appear to customers in the marketplace.

data.name: FAQ3Question
data.value: How do I choose the right person?

data.name: FAQ3Answer
data.value: Use filters, view profiles, and check ratings and reviews to compare options before deciding.

data.name: FAQ4Question
data.value: Can I save posts to review later?

data.name: FAQ4Answer
data.value: Yes. You can add posts to Favorites so you can return to them anytime.

data.name: CTASubtitle
data.value: Join Homeix and manage home services with more trust, clarity, and control.

data.name: RolesSubtitle
data.value: Homeix is designed to support both sides of the home-service process in one organized system.

data.name: CustomerDesc
data.value: Customers use Homeix to request home services and explore available professionals through clear profiles, structured posts, and community feedback.

data.name: CustomerPoint1
data.value: Create service requests with detailed descriptions

data.name: CustomerPoint2
data.value: Compare professionals using profiles and ratings

data.name: CustomerPoint3
data.value: View photos, price ranges, and reviews

data.name: ProfessionalDesc
data.value: Professionals use Homeix to present their services in a verified marketplace and connect with customers seeking reliable home-service solutions.

data.name: ProfessionalPoint1
data.value: Apply for verification before offering services

data.name: ProfessionalPoint2
data.value: Publish structured service posts with clear details

data.name: ProfessionalPoint3
data.value: Build reputation through ratings and reviews

data.name: ProfessionalPoint4
data.value: Manage services and visibility from one platform
